name: Bad Game 3 (Preview)
description: This is a demo/preview of Bad Game 3, Part One. The game will be released in three-four parts (undecided).  Once the game is finished, I will open it up for download. Yes, I know you can't beat it yet. Remember that this game is still in early development and things are subject to change. This is not trying to be a direct ripoff of the Henry Stickmin Saga, rather more of a fan game.
